name: Decent Neon Sci-Fi VR Management Shooter (Celest 2)
name_original: Decent Neon Sci-Fi VR Management Shooter (Celest 2)
description:
Decent Neon Sci-Fi VR Management Shooter (Celest 2) is a shooter game developed by Freazyy. It came out on 01-05-2022.
You can play Decent Neon Sci-Fi VR Management Shooter (Celest 2) on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
